subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Donald Williams was named the N.C.A.A. tournament’s most outstanding player in 1993, but his effort was overshadowed by Chris Webber’s attempted timeout.
snippet: Donald Williams was named the N.C.A.A. tournament’s most outstanding player in 1993, but his effort was overshadowed by Chris Webber’s attempted timeout.
